" Hey Mike, Wait for me!" Jake yelled out while running down St. Joseph boulevard trying to keep up... Mike stopped running and turned around yelling, "Come on, I don't want to miss the bus!" " I know, i been waiting so long to see this movie to, but man i'm just not as fast as a runner than you are you know that" Jake Replied back..

A few blocks down Jasmine walked out of a building a little sad and depressed after what seems to be a disappointing search, as she needed to return home that night, without finding the person she was hoping to find... Without realizing she is now walking across the street.

"Oh no, a Girl is about to get run over" Jake yelled, and without thinking he bolted towards the girl pushing her out of the way, But unfortunately got hit by a car instead in the process.
Jasmine got up and turned around and found a boy lieing on the ground bleeding, and instinctivly she casted a small freeze time spell that froze time, the world around her is frozen in time as if they were statues.. and then she walked towards the boy speaking softly " Could you be the person i was searching for?" Then she looks up to the sky and summons her father.

" Yes, my child?" Drake said. Jasmine says" Father, can you save this human, i think he is the person I was searching for" Drake looks at the boy lieing on the ground, then looks back at Jasmine and replies" Are you sure that this is the person? if he turns out to be the wrong one it could be very devastating to any possible alliance with the humans, after all it was a bad choice that ended the last alliance that we had with humans.." Jasmine replies back " Im sure father" Drake nods, and then moves towards the boy and casts a spell, a glow started to surround Jake and Jasmine... Drake Said " its now done, i have linked your spirit with this child's he will now live as long as you do and will allow him to heal the link will disipate when he reaches 17.. although you are still not mated with him yet, unfortunatly he is too young to take on this reponsibility yet, so i will lock this memory of the event in his mind... and wipe any memory of this event from all humans involved in this incident, You must not approach him while this link is active ok?" Jasmine replied " Yes father" Drake said " dont worry though he will vaguely remember you, as in his memorys place i will fabricate a memory that you simply just bumped into each other and talked for a while"

Drake towards Jake and now incants a few more words, and with that Jasmine and Drake disappears leaving Jake sitting on a bench located on the side of the road.. With Mike sitting beside him waiting for bus. Jake having no memory of what transpired except for meeting a girl that he enjoyed talking to.

113.content:
Even after 7 years, Ted still picks on Jake. He was hoping not to bump into him today... unfortunately he did.

“Well if it isn’t that same loser I beat up yesterday!” he says, then as he laughs, “Or more like every day!” Jake backs up, and says “Look, don’t you think we’re a bit too old for this now? I mean, this has been going on for 7 years! And wouldn’t you think it gets boring to just pick on the same person every day?”

As he walks toward him, Ted simply explains, “Trust me, I tried. But it seems that you’re the only one who never fights back. And so it’s fun to pick on you because of that.” He lifts his fists up, “Now, please have your stomach in good view so it’s easier to do this?”

That fact got to Jake. He realized that whenever he’s in this situation, he never really tries to do anything to stop it. At this moment, he is now cornered at a wall. Ted raises his fist, “Take this you pipsqueak!” he says as he throws his fist towards him.
For the first time in history, Jake actually dodges his attack, making him hit the wall. Ted realizes that he dodged his attack, and so he tried again. Jake barely dodged his second attack, making himself stumble afterwards. “Hey!” says Ted, “Stay still so I can hit you!”

He tried to hit him again, but he ducks, and attempts to take him down. Unfortunately, Ted is too big for him to do that. He kicks Jake off of him, making him fall to the ground. He rolls to evade Ted, and gets up to run. “Hey! Get back here!” says Ted as he runs toward him.

Mike finally finishes using the restroom. But when he comes out, neither Jake nor Ted is anywhere to be found. Meanwhile, Ted is still running after Jake… until someone certain saw them…

11312.content:
Jasmine's heart was racing, seeing the love of her life unconscious and beaten by this cruel human! She felt the raging hatred surging in her, but remembered her father's teachings. She struggled, fighting down the emotion, but as the bully strode over the prone form of Jake she had to fight the urge to just surge into dragon form and roar at the annoying human... It was hard but she resisted and instead strode powerfully up behind the boy and tapped him on the shoulder.

"Whu?" Came the surprised voice of the bully.

"Cease this at once or I will be forced to hurt you." She said, her eyes glaring into his.

A moment of fluster came to his eyes, and she knew she could be very intimidating, but his self-importance reasserted itself and he chuckled.

"What? Jakey has girls fight for him now? Oooh I'm so scared!" He said, then gave her a dismissing wave of the hand before turning around towards Jake on the ground once more, flexing his knuckles in anticipation. "Now get out of here girl. I got fun stuff to deal with."

Jasmine literally saw red. A hand clamped on the boy's shoulder and spun him around. He gasped at the rather strong motion, almost falling over from the sudden twist, then blinked as he saw a fist swinging for him.

Amazingly he dodged. True, Jasmine was not a war dragon and did not have a lot of experience of fighting, let alone fighting in human form, but her reflexes were fast. It was impressive this boy avoided it.

"God damn it!" He yelled, then swung back hard.

*CLANG!*

"OW OW OW OW!" He yelled, hopping from one foot to the other clutching his hand where he'd struck her stomach scales. She smiled viciously and while he was distracted slammed a fist into his gut, leaving him winded and curling up onto the floor clutching his belly.

With the threat dealt with she turned to her love and crouched down beside him.

"Jake? Are you OK?"

Jake slowly awoke, pain still surging in his gut, opened his eyes... and gulped. A beautiful girl was gazing down at him, a smile edging her mouth, but not a callous one. With sunlight streaming down behind her from a hole in the ceiling she looked like an angel!

11312313.content:
"Who are you?" Jake says, then as Jasmine frowns he shakes his head. "OK, I got your name but..." He looks askance at her, getting the impression something is.... off about her. Not wrong just... different.

Jasmine sighed and sat back a little from him.

"It seems I have not spent enough time like this. I should have realized it would be easy to detect the differences. Jake, as I said my name is Jasmine but I am not a normal human girl. I... am a dragon."

For some reason Jake doesn't laugh at that. Something clicks in his head and despite the blur of dreams he connects her face.

"Oh my god you're my dream girl!"

Jasmine's eyes suddenly go wide, misinterpreting his words slightly, and she blushes hard.

"I... Jake! I had hoped you felt the same for me but..." She shook her head, calming visibly. "But we must not dally on such things. There is much we must discuss first. Dragons have hidden themselves from the human world for a long time, the danger from such visits across the divide enough to hinder such meetings. But suffice to say that once, over three thousand years ago, Dragons and humans fought together against an ancient enemy. An alliance was formed, joining the brave warriors and powerful mages of humankind with the natural gifts and instinctive magics of dragons. Together we fought and bested the enemy, but did not defeat it outright. Banished it stayed on the edges of reality, waiting to return. There have been a few... scouts by the enemy in the past, but they have been minor. With humans losing their magic they were no match so we dealt with the few problems. But recently as humans have improved their machines we realized there is a new opportunity. A mix of our gifts and your new capabilities may yet deal with this enemy. But to do that a true alliance must form once more."

Jake stared at her while she stated this long speech. It sounded rehearsed but still got the feeling she was speaking from the heart. She... was a dragon? She looked wonderful, but hardly draconic. But he'd had dreams of a girl saving him, repeating many times over the years, and she was the spitting image of that dream. It was tricky to remember the details, but once he saw her in a clear light the resemblance was unmistakable.

But Jasmine hadn't finished her speech.

"For humans and dragons to be one once more and align against the darkness a joining must occur. A link between the two realms. I have already undergone a casting to allow me to shift to human form, but humans have lost their art. The Dragon council is resolved that only a partnership between two of both worlds will link the two realms. I sought you out seven years ago, looking for a mate..." She blushed. "... and you found me! You saved me back then. I know you do not remember, but you showed a selflessness and bravery even at such a young age that impressed me. As the years went by and I watched you I fell more and more in love with you. Please, consent to be my mate. Be with me, and by so joining know that you will gain much. You will be able to turn into a dragon just as I can become a human." She frowned slightly, a little anxiousness on her face. "For the first two years it is likely you will be... stuck as a dragon. We still are not certain how humans lost their magic, but it has limited things. My father is a master of the arts and he says the joining will have no ill effects for either of us. Trust him, please."

Jake gazes up at her, mouth agape at what he has just heard.

She... wants to be his girlfriend? Wife? Mate?

113123133.content:
"My daughter speaks the truth."

Jake jerked his head to the left seeing a severe looking man with short cropped brown hair. He looked tall, dressed in a formal black suit, arms crossed behind his back. Jasmine too jerked as well at the man's entrance.

"Father! I did not expect you."

"Daughter. I hope you forgive me scrying you while you tended matters. This is a rather important situation after all." His severe expression melted slightly as he smiled at her. "And I am glad to see you can handle yourself."

"He was a mere boy." She said, blushing slightly.

"True, but you have never been a fighter." He said, smiling warmly at her. Then his gaze got more serious and he turned back to Jake. "Now, Jake, there is more you must be aware of. First my name is Drake, a powerful name among dragonkind and remembered by humans in your name for us. Both for Dragons and humans the age of eighteen is an important time. True humans thought less of it in ages past, but it has always meant a great deal to dragons. Your eighteenth birthday is coming in two weeks is it not?" Jake nodded wordlessly. "Good. It is our intention that, if you agree, your formal bonding with my daughter commence at that time. I should note she is not eighteen but twenty seven, but age is a little different for ourselves. Ages vary enormously depending on power of the dragon in question and vary from two hundred to several thousand years." A faint smile tinges his lips as his gaze fixes harder on Jake. "Another benefit for yourself should you chose to join. My daughter inherits my power, despite her lack of experience in the arts, and likely you will live to a considerable age should you agree."

"Father!" Jasmine says, a little put out. "Bribery is no way to entice him to agree!"

Her father chuckled and shook his head.

"My daughter, some day you will need to learn such things. Governance is no place for being meek and you will inherit my place eventually."

She sighs, a little frustrated, and turns to Jake.

"I apologize for my father. Please, try to consider this for what it means for us... for me. I am asking you to join with me." She rolls her eyes. "And as my father so kindly put it, when you turn eighteen the council will consider it time for you to formalize it." She blinks. "Not that you have to wait to mate of course. I have been waiting a very long time for this moment and I understand the need." Her smiling face beams down at Jake.

Wait, is she saying...? Jake turns to look at her father who seems to still be smiling at the two of them. He notices Jake's odd look.

"Daughter. I do believe the humans do not talk of mating in public. You may need to be a little more circumspect in future."

"Oh... I... that explains all the suggestive phrases." She said, a thoughtful look. "They have to talk about it without actually saying it? Hmmm. Odd."

"No, it is not. This appearance I chose, but was facilitated by my father. I can control it, and this is, in part, a reflection of my true self, but it is not me." Her smile fades, leaving just the corners of her lips raised. "Do you wish to see me as I truly am?"

"I... yeah. I'd like that." Jake said with dry mouth.

"Very well. I should add that while we are together, at least to begin with, I will be staying as a human. I need to fit in to be with you until you are ready to travel to our realm. As I said that will likely take some time. None-the-less I am happy to wish to see my true form."

Jake stands up, a little shaky but OK, and licks his lips.

Jasmine smiles, straightens her rather pretty, flowery dress, and hooks an arm through Jake's.

"So, shall we venture to school?" She says happily.

"Take care daughter, and I remind you you have an appointment tomorrow with the council before you return to reside with Jake. If he desires you to stay with him that is?"

"I... of course father." Jasmine says, Jake keeping his mouth shut. This is all way too much to take in all at once.

The two head out, arms locked together, as Jake shows the way to school from here. It's not far, just that he lives outside of town so it's a fair bit of walking (no buses in that region unfortunately). Only a ten minute walk, but it gets interesting. Mainly as Jasmine soon shifts her grip from looping through his arm to wrapping around his waist. Then a few minutes later sliding lower with her hand warmly cupping his bum! She's also getting as close to him as she can and still walk beside him easily.

Feeling her warm body against him Jake is in heaven. True, he really doesn't know her, but she seems nice and... has an incredibly hot body! He blinks as he realizes it's not hers. Her real form is some kind of dragon. He can't really wrap his mind around that, but just knows that she looks very pretty now at least. And feels nice against him as well.

"Here we are." He says as they get to the outskirts of town and the school entrance is ahead. "Hope you have a nice day Jasmine."

"Oh, I'm certain we will have a joyous day Jake!" She says, and doesn't take the hint, still walking with him, her hand caressing his backside while they walk into the school gate.

Mike and Jake looked at each other. then said " But the barrier said not to enter."Jasmine replied"Don't worry about that, it was fake really, as you see my family is sort of eccentric and prefers to keep their privacy, they bought the park and set a portion of the park where they can have their privacy. while keeping the remainder of the park open to the public" After a short walk in a passage that was between to cliff faces it opened up to a yard with what seems to be a house built right into the cliff face at the other end of the yard..

Then Jasmine looked at Jake " I want to show you something, but whatever I show you don't be afraid ok?" Jasmine said... Jake replied "Ok" Jamsine then looked at Mike and asked" Ok? mike" Mike nodded. With that Jasmine started to walk towards the center of the yard then turned back to face Jake and Mike. Jasmine then started to transform into her dragon form. Jake and mike looked at each other with shock then back at Jasmine who is now a huge red dragon looking back at them... But at the same time they were not scared at all, shocked yes but for some reason they didnt feel that there were in danger in any way..

Jasmine then looked at Jake and said" Jake, as you see I am a dragon, and as you should know your dreams you been having was a side effect of the link we shared for the past 7 years" Jake asked with a puzzled look " A link?" Jasmine replied" Yes, to be honest our chance encounter 7 years ago didnt happen as you remember it." With that she uttered a few words causing Jake to remember everything that happened 7 years ago. Jake now remembering everything said " Wow, I suppose I owe you my life"
"Jake, ever since that day I fell in love with you, and the whole main reason for this meeting is that I want to ask you if you want to become my mate."

Jake now looking at Jasmine surprised then replies......

Jasmine now motions Jake to take her hand as she now heads to enter the house.... and then takes him to her room.

Jasmine then said" First in order for a human to mate with a dragon you must first become a dragon, keep in mind even though you can change your mind about mating with me once you become a dragon you will always be a dragon.. what is one cannot be undone, Are you sure you want to do this?" info.brief_description: A human holds the key to a new alliance between humans and dragons.
info.description:
A long time ago humans used to fight along side dragons against a great evil, And now with the threat of it returning to the world, A dragon sets out to find a human male to mate with to bring about a new dragon-human alliance.

Characters:
Jake: A human male age 17, Only has 1 friend in high school, Often picked on by bullies, always tries to defend other people even though most attempts end up in him getting beat up. And always teased about the strange dreams he has.

Mike: Jake's only friend age 18 , often saves him from being beat up by the bullies,

Jasmine A female Red Dragon princess, very kind, Stong believer in a prophecy that fortells a new alliance between humans and dragons, and believes she will be the one to find the human... and as with all dragons she can take a human form

Ted A school bully who always picks on Jake

Tammy The schools head cheerleader, always picked on Jake, however due to a accident that nearly ended her life she realized that she has feelings for Jake, and is determined to make Jake her Boyfriend regardless of how futile it may be
Rules:

1. No killing of main characters(although can be brought close to death), new characters can be introduced and killed off as necessary
2. No One line chapters, Each chapter must at least contain a paragraph, I will permit a chapter merely for giving more choices provided you choose 1 of the choices yourself..
3. When the time comes for the mating it can be either willing or unwilling but if its unwilling it must be done in effort to save the persons life.. the process either willing or unwilling will end up giving josh the ability to transform into a dragon form at will
4. Mike can either know about jake's new role in the world or be unaware of it..
5. Story progression must be logical, for example, if a character at the end of the chapter decided to take a ride on a bus home, the next chapter should reflect that he was on the bus,
6. and have fun :)

I should also note that for the sake of the story the mating wont happen till after a couple chapters, and the first chapter will be in the past

I will randomly reward 150 points for good additions...
